column3: Task
Remove old O-rings, if any
Remove old O-rings, if any
Clean all components with acetone
Insert circumferential O-ring
Insert the two O-rings on the output side
Insert the two O-rings on the input side
Insert the piston into the housing using the auxiliary tool
Insert the two springs into the piston
Fix the cover of the housing slightly with the four screws
Tighten the four screws crosswise until the housing is completely closed
Steps before riveting the oxidizer tank to the MainOx section
column4: Before riveting Ox tank to MainOx section

column3: Check if all fittings of the main line are tightened
Check correct installation of the MainOx
Check if the check valves are installed with the correct orientation
Check if all fittings of the secondary supply line are tightened
Check valve plugs
Check if all fittings of the N2O coupling are tightened
After the shell is mounted, check the alignment of the N2O coupling
Steps before riveting the HP section to the antenna ring

column3: Check if fitting the the HP tank is tightened

column3: Check if all fittings are tightened
Check valve plugs
Close RMDV
Steps after assembling the structure of the rocket
Tighten fitting of the main line between Main Ox and Engine
Tighten fitting of the main line between HP tank and pressure regulator
Tighten fitting of the secondary suppy line
Check if RDV exit matches the hole in the shell
Insert RDV exit cover
